name: Mine Out
description:
Dig deep into the ground with this mix of mining, digging, and a mine cart as a paddle. Blast through level after level of this fast paced explosive arcade mining adventure! We got cows and pigs and pickaxes what more could your heart desire, go ahead download my game now, it is calling to you...

* Exploding Sheep
* Shovels and Pickaxes
* Collect Cows
* Mine cart as a paddle
* Multiple brick and dirt blocks
* Bounce Pigs and Mine Blocks
* 100% indie for decades

Mine Out is on Twitter @MineOutGame

Design and Code by Glen Martin (@RealZenfar on Twitter and http://www.zenfar.com)
Pig and Cow graphics by Neel Mehta used under Creative Commons (CC BY-SA 3.0 US) https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/us/
